parameters.name: DynamicTagRuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the tag rule.

parameters.name: GroupFounderTagKey
parameters.description: The tag key that is created for the application group by using the tag rule.

parameters.name: GroupFounderTagValue
parameters.description: The tag value that is created for the application group by using the tag rule.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group. Separate multiple application group IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the application group.

parameters.name: IncludeTemplateHistory
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include the historical alert templates that are applied to the application group in the response. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. This parameter is used to query the application group to which the specified instance belongs.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that is used for the search.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: SelectContactGroups
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include the alert contact groups in the response. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the application group.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the application group. Valid values:

*   custom: a self-managed application group
*   ehpc_cluster: an application group that is synchronized from an Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) cluster
*   kubernetes: an application group that is synchronized from a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster

parameters.name: Types
parameters.description:
The type of the application group. Valid values:

*   custom: a self-managed application group
*   ehpc_cluster: an application group that is synchronized from an Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) cluster
*   kubernetes: an application group that is synchronized from a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster
*   tag: an application group that is automatically created by using tags
*   resMgr: an application group that is created by using resource groups
*   ess: an application group that is synchronized from Auto Scaling (ESS)
